Pre-Game Insights: Analysts predicted a close game between India and Pakistan
India has been in good form in the shortest format of the game, having defeated Australia and South Africa at home and the hosts in a warm-up contest
Pakistan has had a mixed performance, drubbing New Zealand and Bangladesh in a tri-series but also being tamed by England and in a warm-up contest
Miscellaneous Highlights: There is a forecast of a heavy downpour at MCG tomorrow that may significantly impact the contest and dampen the spirits of the fans and the players alike
Others: India will rely on their batting that features the hallowed likes of KL Rahul, Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli
A rock-solid middle-order comprising SKY, Hardik Pandya and DK will provide them the much-needed bookend
India will have a major leak to plug when it comes to their death bowling
Pakistan has a strong opening pair in Babar Azam and Mohammad Rizwan
Their major concern will be a wobbling middle-order
Pakistan also has a fine bowling line-up featuring some of the worldâ€™s finest quicks
